issue.title: [CF 1136] Issue with [AuraDuration:TMWFormatDuration]
issue.body:
I've come across an issue using the DogTag above. It appears to work fine, but just before the timer hits zero and disappears I get a long string of numbers. The exact text I'm using is:  [AuraDuration("Rupture", unit="target"):TMWFormatDuration]

I've had this happen with both buffs on my character, and debuffs on the target.

Here is the string for the alerts. I'm using version 7.3.3

^1^T^SColumns^N2 ^STree2^b ^SGUID^STMW:group:1Lcj5u6NTrSi ^SIcons^T ^N1^T ^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Scooldown ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SCOMBO ^SOperator^S>= ^SPrtsBefore^N1 ^SLevel^N5 ^t^N2^T ^SType^SMANAUSABLE ^SName^SEnvenom ^SPrtsBefore^N2 ^t^N3^T ^SType^SBUFFDUR ^SPrtsAfter^N1 ^SOperator^S<= ^SName^SEnvenom ^SLevel^N1.8 ^t^N4^T ^SType^SENERGY ^SPrtsAfter^N2 ^SOperator^S>= ^SLevel^N90 ^SAndOr^SOR ^t^Sn^N4 ^t^SName^SEnvenom ^SClockGCD^B ^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STextLayout^STMW:textlayout:1LZUXVCArDDl ^STexts^T ^N1^S[AuraDuration("Envenom",~`unit="player"):TMWFormatDuration]~` ^t^t^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N2^T ^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Scooldown ^SName^SRupture ^SClockGCD^B ^SShowTimerText^B ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SCOMBO ^SOperator^S>= ^SLevel^N5 ^t^N2^T ^SType^SMANAUSABLE ^SName^SRupture ^t^N3^T ^SType^SDEBUFFDUR ^SUnit^Starget ^SOperator^S<= ^SName^SRupture ^SLevel^N7 ^t^Sn^N3 ^t^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STextLayout^STMW:textlayout:1LZUXVCArDDl ^STexts^T ^N1^S[AuraDuration("Rupture",~`unit="target"):TMWFormatDuration]~` ^t^t^t^SEnabled^B ^t^t^SName^SDuration~`Issue ^STree3^b ^t^N73301^S~`~| ^Sgroup^N4 ^^

^1 ^T^N1^T ^SAnchors^T ^N1^T ^Sy^N-2 ^t^t^SName^SElvUI~`Font ^SStringName^SNumber ^t^SGUID^STMW:textlayout:1LZUXVCArDDl ^SName^SCenter~`Small ^t^N73301^S~`~| ^Stextlayout^STMW:textlayout:1LZUXVCArDDl ^^


> Posted by CurseForge user Azaeruss | Imported from CurseForge issue #1136 | Raw
